name: @pdrbrnd/music-mcp
description: MCP server for controlling Apple Music on macOS with full catalog search - play tracks, control playback, manage playlists, discover new music
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that provides full control over Apple Music on macOS. Features include playing specific tracks, controlling playback (play/pause/next/previous), searching your music library and the full Apple Music catalog (100M+ songs), managing playlists with catalog integration, music discovery, and getting current track information.

tools.name: execute_music_command
tools.description: Control music playback (play, pause, next, previous, play specific tracks)

tools.name: get_music_info
tools.description: Get current track info, playback status, and library statistics

tools.name: search_music
tools.description: Search your music library by artist, album, or track

tools.name: manage_playlist
tools.description: List playlists, get tracks, and manage playlist contents with catalog search support

tools.name: queue_music
tools.description: Enhanced queue management - view queue, add tracks, play queue, and control playback order

tools.name: search_apple_music_catalog
tools.description: Search the full Apple Music catalog (100M+ songs) for music discovery

tools.name: add_catalog_track_to_library
tools.description: Add tracks from Apple Music catalog to your library
